trans-unit.target: Library of astronomical algorithms in Python.

trans-unit.source: Add method magnitude() to planet classes
trans-unit.target: 惑星クラスにメソッド magnitude()を追加

trans-unit.source: Add method to compute rising and setting times of the Sun
trans-unit.target: 太陽の上昇時間と沈み込み時間を計算するメソッドを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Add method to compute the parallax correction to Earth class
trans-unit.target: Earthクラスに視差補正を計算するメソッドを追加する

trans-unit.source: Add methods to compute the passage through the nodes
trans-unit.target: ノードの通過を計算するメソッドを追加します。

trans-unit.source: Add methods to compute the perihelion and aphelion of all planets
trans-unit.target: すべての惑星の近日点と近日点を計算するメソッドを追加しました。
Added ‘Pluto’ class

trans-unit.source: Added ‘geocentric_position()’ method to ‘Minor’ class, and added conjunction and opposition methods for Mercury, Venus and Mars.
trans-unit.target: Added ‘geocentric_position()’ method to ‘Minor’ class, and added conjunction and opposition methods for Mercury, Venus and Mars.
座標モジュールを追加しました。
Sunモジュールを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added Venus module and VSOP87-based positioning methods
trans-unit.target: 金星モジュールとVSOP87ベースの位置決め方法を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added class ‘Minor’, as well as functions to compute velocity of an object and length of an orbit
trans-unit.target: Added class ‘Minor’, as well as functions to compute velocity of an object and length of an orbit
Added classes ‘Jupiter’ and ‘Saturn’

trans-unit.source: Added classes ‘Uranus’ and ‘Neptune’, plus additional functions in Coordinates module’
trans-unit.target: Added classes ‘Uranus’ and ‘Neptune’, plus additional functions in Coordinates module’

trans-unit.source: Added conjunction and opposition methods for Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune
trans-unit.target: 木星、土星、天王星、海王星のコンジャンクションと対位法を追加しました。
Added function ‘kepler_equation()’ to ‘Coordinates’ module, and ‘orbital_elements’ methods to classes ‘Mercury’, ‘Venus’, ‘Earth’, ‘Mars’, ‘Jupiter’, ‘Saturn’, ‘Uranus’ and ‘Neptune’
Added function ‘times_rise_transit_set()’ to Coordinates module

trans-unit.source: Added functions for parallactic angle, ecliptic points in the horizon, angle between north celestial pole and north pole of the ecliptic, and diurnal path vs. the horizon at time of rising or setting
trans-unit.target: 視差角、地平線上の黄道点、黄道北天極と黄道北極の間の角度、日周経路と地平線の対地平線の上昇時・沈降時の機能を追加

trans-unit.source: Added functions to compute angular separation to Coordinates module
trans-unit.target: Coordinatesモジュールに角度分離を計算する関数を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added functions to compute atmospheric refraction to Coordinates module
trans-unit.target: Coordinatesモジュールに大気の屈折を計算する機能を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added functions to compute if three objects are in a straight line, and the smallest diameter of a circle containing them.
trans-unit.target: 3つのオブジェクトが直線上にあるかどうか、それらを含む円の最小直径を計算する関数を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added functions to compute relative position angles and conjunctions
trans-unit.target: 相対位置の角度と接続詞を計算する関数を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added heliocentric position method for J2000.0 (Earth) and rectangular coordinates methods (Sun)
trans-unit.target: J2000.0(地球)と矩形座標法(太陽)のためのヘリオセントリック位置法を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added methods ‘geocentric_position()’ to all the planets
trans-unit.target: Added methods ‘geocentric_position()’ to all the planets

trans-unit.source: Added methods related to nutation corrections
trans-unit.target: ナチュエーション補正に関連するメソッドを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added precession and proper motion methods, and changed handling of Epoch class
trans-unit.target: プリセッションと適切な動きのメソッドを追加し、エポッククラスの扱いを変更しました。

trans-unit.source: Added several conversion functions to Coordinates module
trans-unit.target: Coordinatesモジュールにいくつかの変換機能を追加

trans-unit.source: Added the complete list of VSOP87 parameters to Venus, method to compute dates of equinoxes and solstices, and the Equation of Time
trans-unit.target: 金星にVSOP87のパラメータの完全なリストを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, PyMeeus makes heavy use of automatic tests. As a general rule, every function or method added must have a corresponding test in the proper place in
trans-unit.target: さらに、PyMeeus は自動テストを多用しています。一般的なルールとして、追加された関数やメソッドはすべて
アングルクラス終了
著者:ダゴベルト・サラザール
COPYING.LESSER

ドキュメントの改善
Documentation: https://pymeeus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
地球クラスを追加
エポッククラス追加
エポッククラス終了

trans-unit.source: Finally, documentation is also a big thing here. Add proper and abundant documentation to your new code. This also includes in-line comments!!!.
trans-unit.target: 最後に、ここではドキュメントも大きな意味を持ちます。新しいコードに適切で豊富なドキュメントを追加しましょう。これにはインラインコメントも含まれます!

trans-unit.source: Fix bug when using fractional seconds, minutes, hours or days, plus documentation improvements
trans-unit.target: 小数秒、数分、数時間、数日を使用する際のバグを修正し、ドキュメントを改善

trans-unit.source: Fix errors in the elongation computation, add tests and examples of use of methods ‘geocentric_position()’, and tests and examples for ‘Pluto’ class
trans-unit.target: Fix errors in the elongation computation, add tests and examples of use of methods ‘geocentric_position()’, and tests and examples for ‘Pluto’ class
Fork it (https://github.com/architest/pymeeus/fork)
GitHub: https://github.com/architest/pymeeus

trans-unit.target: If you have Sphinx installed, you can generate your own, latest documentation going to directory ‘docs’ and issuing:

trans-unit.target: Python3がお好きな方は

trans-unit.source: Minor bug fixing, added methods ‘ephemeris_physical_observations()’ and ‘beginning_synodic_rotation()’, and added classes ‘Mercury’ and ‘Mars’
trans-unit.target: Minor bug fixing, added methods ‘ephemeris_physical_observations()’ and ‘beginning_synodic_rotation()’, and added classes ‘Mercury’ and ‘Mars’
または、ユーザーごとのインストールの場合。

trans-unit.source: Please bear in mind that PyMeeus follows the PEP8 style guide for Python code (PEP8). We suggest you install and use a linter like Flake8 before contributing.
trans-unit.target: Please bear in mind that PyMeeus follows the PEP8 style guide for Python code (PEP8). We suggest you install and use a linter like Flake8 before contributing.
枝への押し付け(

trans-unit.source: PyMeeus is a Python implementation of the astronomical algorithms described in the classical book “Astronomical Algorithms, 2nd Edition, Willmann-Bell Inc. (1998)” by Jean Meeus.
trans-unit.target: PyMeeus is a Python implementation of the astronomical algorithms described in the classical book “Astronomical Algorithms, 2nd Edition, Willmann-Bell Inc. (1998)” by Jean Meeus.

trans-unit.source: Python implementation of Jean Meeus astronomical routines
trans-unit.target: Jean Meeusの天文ルーチンのPython実装
不要な依存関係を削除
ドキュメントの大幅な改善

trans-unit.source: The easiest way of installing PyMeeus is using pip:
trans-unit.target: PyMeeusをインストールする一番簡単な方法はpipを使うことです。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method to contribute is through forking and pull requests:
trans-unit.target: 貢献するための好ましい方法は、フォークやプルリクエストによるものです。

trans-unit.source: Then the HTML documentation pages can be found in ‘build/html’.
trans-unit.target: Then the HTML documentation pages can be found in ‘build/html’.

trans-unit.source: There are great astronomical libraries out there. For instance, if you’re looking for high precision and speed you should take a look at libnova. For a set of python modules aimed at professional astronomers, you should look at Astropy. On the other hand, the advantages of PyMeeus are its simplicity, ease of use, ease of reading, ease of installation (it has the minimum amount of dependencies) and abundant documentation.
trans-unit.target: There are great astronomical libraries out there. For instance, if you’re looking for high precision and speed you should take a look at libnova. For a set of python modules aimed at professional astronomers, you should look at Astropy. On the other hand, the advantages of PyMeeus are its simplicity, ease of use, ease of reading, ease of installation (it has the minimum amount of dependencies) and abundant documentation.
